column.name: uuid
column.description: A Universally Unique Identifier for an entity.

column.name: merchant_reference
column.description: A unique reference identifier for a merchant.

column.name: importer_type
column.description: The type of importer used for the data import (e.g., "product", "product-offer").

column.name: status
column.description: The current status of an entity (e.g., "active", "pending", "approved").

column.name: original_file_name
column.description: The original name of the uploaded file for search and display purposes.

column.name: file_info
column.description: Json-encoded information about the file, including details like uploaded URL, file system name, original file name, content type, type, size, real path, and content.

column.name: import_result
column.description: Json-encoded result of the import operation, containing details such as processed entities count, failed entities count, errors, started at, and finished at timestamps.
